text: Approval for minor modifications to the 3.8 oz jar packaging system used for the models 7000 and 7000tfx, carpentier-edwards perimount magna mitral bioprostheses and a new name and model number.  The device, as modified, will be marketed under the trade name carpentier-edwards perimount magna ease mitral bioprostheses models 7100 and 7100tfx and are indicated for mitral valve replacement.
